name: Classic Silver
description: A timeless silver watch with genuine leather strap. This elegant timepiece features a minimalist design with a clean white dial, silver hour markers, and a durable stainless steel case. Perfect for both formal and casual occasions, the Classic Silver watch combines traditional craftsmanship with modern reliability for a truly versatile accessory.

name: Luxury Gold
description: An exquisite gold-plated watch that exudes luxury. This premium timepiece features a sophisticated champagne dial with roman numerals, a date window at 3 o'clock, and a polished gold-tone stainless steel bracelet. The Luxury Gold watch is a statement of refinement, designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

name: Sport Black
description: A rugged sport watch designed for active lifestyles. This durable timepiece features a black silicone strap, bright luminous hands and markers, and multiple chronograph dials for precise timing. Water-resistant and shock-resistant, the Sport Black watch is the perfect companion for your athletic pursuits and outdoor adventures.

name: Casual Brown
description: A versatile casual watch with a warm brown leather strap. This comfortable timepiece features a simple brown dial with gold-tone accents, a date window, and a sleek stainless steel case. The Casual Brown watch blends effortlessly with your everyday wardrobe, offering reliable timekeeping with understated style.

name: Smart Digital
description: A cutting-edge digital smartwatch with health and fitness tracking capabilities. This modern timepiece features a vibrant color touchscreen, customizable watch faces, and a sleek silicone strap. The Smart Digital watch connects to your phone for notifications and offers heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and multiple workout modes.

name: Vintage Leather
description: A nostalgic watch inspired by classic designs from the mid-20th century. This vintage-style timepiece features an aged leather strap, cream dial with retro typography, and a domed crystal. The Vintage Leather watch brings timeless appeal to your wrist, combining historical aesthetics with modern reliability.
